name: Diet-Nova Update_91_v2.0.236
description: v2.0.236: Updated Meal Planner Quick Diet Templates to use the new 'diet_name' column for selection. Kcal is now automatically derived and displayed as read-only based on the selected diet name. Reinforced arithmetic safety in macro calculation memos to prevent potential runtime errors. Maintained previous v2.0.235 fixes (Day Menu AM/PM stability and selection logic).
